tool.name: Get an ISA study archive
tool.description: Get an ISA ZIP archive from MetaboLights

param.name: mtbls_id
param.label: MetaboLights Study Identifier.
param.help: MTBLS ID available at MetaboLights, e.g. MTBLS2.

tool.help:
=================================== Get ISA-Tab files from MetaboLights ===================================
This tool downloads ISA-Tab metadata files from MetaboLights an ISA-Tab archive (zip).
----- Input -----
MetaboLights Study Identifier ============================= MTBLS ID available at MetaboLights, e.g. MTBLS2.
------ Output ------
Zip file containing ISA files ============================= The output zip file will contain the i_*.txt, s_*.txt and a_*.txt files expected in an *ISA-Tab* archive.
For details on the ISA-Tab format, please see http://isa-specs.readthedocs.io/en/latest/isatab.html
